thread.title: UCF hit hard by unexpected losses
thread.title_full: UCF hit hard by unexpected losses

author: ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN
title: UCF hit hard by unexpected losses
text:
Wednesday, October 7, 2015 9:05 PM EDT 
UCF hit hard by unexpected losses BY ED DAIGNEAULTREPUBLICAN-AMERICAN Central Florida head coach George O'Leary, right, talks with an official in the first quarter of an NCAA college football game against Connecticut in East Hartford, Conn., Saturday, Nov. 1, 2014. Connecticut won 37-29. (AP Photo/Michael Dwyer) Central Florida's football program took a hit from graduation, but there was enough remaining that many figured the Knights would again be in the hunt for an American Athletic Conference title.If only the many had crystal balls.
